1111100110111111 0010110011110010 1 -> sum: 0010011010110010, cout: 1
0100011111001001 0101100111111100 1 -> sum: 1010000111000110, cout: 0
1100001110110000 1101101101100101 0 -> sum: 1001111100010101, cout: 1
0010011100000011 0010000011100110 0 -> sum: 0100011111101001, cout: 0
1000100111010000 0111011100010100 1 -> sum: 0000000011100101, cout: 1
1110100100001101 0110010011010101 1 -> sum: 0100110111100011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
